titles.title: To prohibit the use of Federal funds for a project or program named for an individual then serving as a Member, Delegate, Resident Commissioner, or Senator of the United States Congress.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Government Organization, Efficiency, and Financial Management.

committee.name: House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

committee.subcommittee: Government Organization, Efficiency, and Financial Management
committee.name: House Oversight and Government Reform

bill.summary: 3/8/2011--Introduced. Prohibits the use of federal funds for a project or program named for an individual currently serving as a Member, Delegate, Resident Commissioner, or Senator of the U.S. Congress.
